price: Aber nein! Wer seinen Bund hält und gottesfürchtig ist, - gewiß, Allah liebt die Gottes fürchtigen.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
